original_text: Everyone must wear sackcloth. You must cover all your animals with sackcloth too. Everyone must pray to God with all their strength. You must all stop doing bad and cruel things.
korean_text: 사람이든지 짐승이든지 다 굵은 베 옷을 입을 것이요 힘써 하나님께 부르짖을 것이며 각기 악한 길과 손으로 행한 강포에서 떠날 것이라

sentences.original_text: You must cover all your animals with sackcloth too
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 모든 동물들도 굵은 베로 덮어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Everyone must pray to God with all their strength
sentences.korean_translation: 모두가 힘을 다해 하나님께 기도해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: You must all stop doing bad and cruel things
sentences.korean_translation: 당신 모두는 나쁘고 잔인한 일들을 멈춰야 합니다
